channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-36887|2024-08-03T10:14:29.218Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20configuration%20history%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin 1155.v28a_46a_cc06a_5 and earlier allows attackers to delete entries from job, agent, and system configuration history, or restore older versions of job, agent, and system configurations.

item.title: CVE-2022-38664|2024-08-03T11:02:14.355Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20configuration%20history%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin 1165.v8cc9fd1f4597 and earlier does not escape the job name on the System Configuration History page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure job names.
